Tip Text: Say Thanks to GOD for the people who created today's food for me.
Call a friend with whom you are not in touch since last 6 months.
Take 10 (ten) deep breaths in fresh air.
Go for/watch a movie with family.
See your old memorable photographs for 15 (fifteen) minutes.
Read 2 (two) pages of any book which you like.
Give small gift to someone you love the most.
